name: LOVED (Gonca7)
description:
LOVED *

This game is about a little boy that moved from is home town and wanted to be loved. I think the theme of the jam is only going to be obvious once the game is finished, but don't worry it will not take you a long time.

I'm 17, and I had a math test this week so i didn't have much time to work on my game, but i think it turned out great.

Hope you enjoy, Gon_ca7 *
